segments.text: Do you like that vintage clock ? It's almost fifty years old .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? It almost looks brand new . And the color designs are so retro .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in the fifties , that clock used to be inside a drive-in burger joint .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way ! My parents used to hang out at those places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is one of my favorite items .
segments.speaker: S1
